程序包 map_reduce_sys.componant

类 ComponentGestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • map_reduce_sys.componant.ComponentGestion
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
    public class ComponentGestion
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class ComponentGestion implements a component that can assign tasks to calculate components and receive tuple of result from Reduce component
    作者:
    Yajie LIU, Zimeng ZHANG

    • 嵌套类概要

      • recieve_Tuple

        public boolean recieve_Tuple​(Tuple t)
        receive tuple from Reduce component and calculate the time of execution
        参数:
        t - Tuple containing the result

      • submitRunCalculTask

        public void submitRunCalculTask​(PluginManagementOut pluginOut,
                                Job job,
                                Task typetask,
                                int numero)
        submit the calculate task , run the code differently depending on the type of Task
        参数:
        pluginOut - PluginManagementOut, plug-in used to launch the task
        job - Job contains the functions used by task
        typetask - store the type of the task,It can be ResourceTask,MapTask or ReduceTask
        numero - For a single job there may be several resource components that work together, numero specifies which one this is

      • connectWithComponentCalcul

        public java.util.ArrayList<fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports.ReflectionOutboundPort> connectWithComponentCalcul​(java.lang.String... portUris)
                                                                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        For the given uri of ports, create a ReflectionOutboundPort to connect with them
        参数:
        portUris - String, uri of the reflection inbound port to be connected
        返回:
        ArrayList(ReflectionOutboundPort) rerturn the list of ReflectionOutboundPort created
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • createPluginsManagementOut

        public java.util.ArrayList<PluginManagementOut> createPluginsManagementOut​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inboundPortUris)
                                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        For the given uri of ports, use them to create PluginManagementOut
        参数:
        inboundPortUris - String, uri of the management inbound port of the PluginManagementOut created
        返回:
        ArrayList(PluginManagementOut) rerturn the list of PluginManagementOut created
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • createJob

        public Job createJob​(Nature n,
                     int nbResource,
                     int Sizetotal)
        depending on the parameters given, create map_reduce job of different nature and size
        参数:
        n - Nature, define the nature of the function_reduce of job
        nbResource - number of resource components to generate the data
        Sizetotal - Total amount of data to be generated
        返回:
        Job rerturn the job created
